Konsumsi Kendaraan Bermotor Masyarakat Jawa Barat Tertinggi di Indonesia, Lewati Jakarta
03 Nov 2019, 10:49 by Ai Rika Rachmawati
BANDUNG, (PR).- Permintaan kendaraan bermotor di Jawa Barat, khususnya Kota Bandung, diprediksi akan terus meningkat. Beberapa waktu terakhir Jawa Barat menempati peringkat pertama provinsi dengan serapan kendaraan bermotor tertinggi di Indonesia, melampaui Jakarta.
Managing Director of Sales Center PT Sokonindo Automobile, Franz Wang, mengatakan bahwa terus meningkatnya permintaan kendaraan bermotor di Jawa Barat, khususnya Kota Bandung, turut mengerek kebutuhan akan diler mobil. Apalagi, menurut dia, karakter konsumen di Kota Bandung menyukai kendaraan berkualitas.
"Dengan populasi dan laju pertumbuhan ekonomi yang naik setiap tahunnya, Kota Bandung menjadi pasar dengan kemampuan mumpuni," ujarnya, pada Peluncuran diler DFSK Pasteur di Jalan. Dr. Djundjunan, Kota Bandung, Sabtu 3 Oktober 2019.
Dia mengatakan, pertumbuhan permintaan kendaraan di Kota Bandung berjalan seiring dengan peningkatan kebutuhan hidup. Bagi masyarakat Kota Bandung, kendaraan bermotor sudah menjadi kebutuhan yang cukup krusial.
Kondisi itu, menurut Franz, menempatkan Kota Bandung sebagai kontributor utama pasar otomotif bagi sejumlah pelaku induatri di sektor tersebut.
Bagi diler DFSK, Bandung memberika  kontribusi penjualan sebanyak 40 persen terhadap penjualan di area Jawa Barat. "Pasar Bandung sangat menjanjikan," tuturnya.
Tingginya permintaan kendaraan bermotor di Kota Bandung tersebut membuat DFSK menambah diler melalui PT Siloam Motor. Diler DFSK tersebut menjadi yang kedua untuk wilayah Kota Bandung.
"Keberadaan Diler ini bukan hanya untuk mengantisipasi permintaan dari Kota Bandung, tapi juga area Bandung Raya, seperti Kabupaten Bandung, Cimahi, dan Kabupaten Bandung Barat," tuturnya.
Dia mengatakan, penambahan diler bisa menjadi solusi agar konsumen tetap bisa dilayani dengan cepat, tepat, dan profesional. Apalagi, karena persaingan yang ketat, kepuasan konsumen menjadi kunci utama bagi entitas bisnis untuk bisa bersaing.
"Diler DFSK Pasteur merupakan outlet kami yang ke-64," tutur Franz.
Miliaran rupiah
Gurihnya pasar kendaraan bermotor di Jabar membuat DFSK berencana mengalokasikan investasi senilai miliaran rupiah untuk pengembangan diler dan outlet di Jawa Barat.
Manager PT Siloam Motor, main dealer DFSK di Jabar, Vincent Leonard TJ mengatakan, terakhir DFSK menggelontorkan dana Rp 4 miliar untuk membangun diler di Bandung.
Setelah diler DFSK Pasteur Siloam Motor, dia berencana mengembangkan outlet di Garut, Cimahi, dan  Soreang. Sebelum di Pasteur, dia baru saja membuka diler di Tasikmalaya.***

The Highest Consumption of Motor Vehicles in West Java Society in Indonesia, Passing Jakarta
03 Nov 2019, 10:49 by Ai Rika Rachmawati
BANDUNG, (PR) .- Demand for motor vehicles in West Java, especially in the city of Bandung, is predicted to continue to increase. Recently West Java was ranked first in the province with the highest absorption of motor vehicles in Indonesia, surpassing Jakarta.
Managing Director of PT Sokonindo Automobile's Sales Center, Franz Wang, said that the increasing demand for motor vehicles in West Java, especially in the city of Bandung, helped hoist the need for car dealerships. Moreover, according to him, the character of consumers in the city of Bandung likes quality vehicles.
"With population and economic growth rates rising every year, the city of Bandung has become a market with qualified capabilities," he said, at the launch of the Pasteur DFSK dealership on the Road. Dr. Djundjunan, Bandung City, Saturday 3 October 2019.
He said the growth in demand for vehicles in the city of Bandung went hand in hand with an increase in the necessities of life. For the people of Bandung City, motorized vehicles have become quite crucial needs.
This condition, according to Franz, places the city of Bandung as a major contributor to the automotive market for a number of industrial players in the sector.
For DFSK dealers, Bandung contributes 40 percent of sales to sales in the West Java area. "The Bandung market is very promising," he said.
The high demand for motor vehicles in the city of Bandung has made DFSK add dealers through PT Siloam Motor. The DFSK dealership became the second for the Bandung City area.
"The existence of this dealership is not only to anticipate requests from the city of Bandung, but also the Greater Bandung area, such as Bandung Regency, Cimahi, and West Bandung Regency," he said.
He said, the addition of dealers can be a solution so that consumers can still be served quickly, precisely, and professionally. Moreover, due to intense competition, customer satisfaction is the main key for business entities to be able to compete.
"The Pasteur DFSK dealership is our 64th outlet," Franz said.
Billions of rupiah
The savvy automotive market in West Java makes DFSK plan to allocate billions of rupiah of investment for the development of dealers and outlets in West Java.
Manager of PT Siloam Motor, the main DFSK dealer in West Java, Vincent Leonard TJ said, the latest DFSK poured funds of Rp 4 billion to build dealerships in Bandung.
After the DFSK Pasteur Siloam Motor dealership, he plans to develop outlets in Garut, Cimahi, and Soreang. Before Pasteur, he had just opened a dealership in Tasikmalaya. ***
